title: Samsung Galaxy S21
des: Flagship phone with 6.2-inch display, Snapdragon 888, and triple camera setup.

title: Samsung S21 Ultra
des: Top-tier phone with 6.8-inch display, 108MP camera, and S-Pen support.

title: Samsung Note 20
des: Premium phone with 6.7-inch display, Exynos 990, and integrated S-Pen.

title: Samsung Galaxy A52
des: Mid-range phone with 6.5-inch display, Snapdragon 720G, and quad camera.

title: Samsung Galaxy A72
des: Mid-range phone with 6.7-inch display, Snapdragon 720G, and 64MP main camera.

title: Samsung Galaxy Fold2
des: Innovative foldable phone with 7.6-inch display, Snapdragon 865+, and triple camera.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip
des: Compact foldable phone with 6.7-inch display, Snapdragon 855+, and dual camera.
